items.title: Apple Card 迎来六周年，重大变革在即 (原标题: Apple Card Turns Six With Big Change Ahead)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## Apple Card 迎来六周年与未来变革

Apple Card 于六年前在美国广泛推出，现已迎来其六周年纪念日。这款信用卡可通过 iPhone 的“钱包”应用进行管理，提供多项核心功能与优势：

*   **核心功能与优势：**
    *   提供颜色编码的消费摘要，帮助用户清晰了解支出。
    *   不收取任何费用。
    *   提供每日返现（Daily Cash），并每日支付到账。
    *   用户还可以开立高收益储蓄账户。

### 重大变革：金融合作伙伴更迭

Apple Card 的六周年纪念日正值其即将迎来重大变革之际。据《华尔街日报》上月报道，摩根大通（Chase Bank 的母公司）正与苹果进行“深入谈判”，有望取代高盛成为 Apple Card 的金融合作伙伴。

*   **高盛退出原因：**
    *   高盛正在逐步退出其消费贷款业务，该业务近年来已亏损数十亿美元。
    *   苹果据称愿意解除与高盛原定于2030年到期的合同。

*   **潜在影响：**
    *   如果 Apple Card 最终更换新的金融合作伙伴，其功能、政策、利率和客户服务流程可能会随之更新，但具体变化尚待观察。
    *   值得注意的是，摩根大通目前不提供类似 Apple Card 储蓄账户的高收益储蓄服务。

### 市场可用性

Apple Card 目前仅在美国可用，短期内没有迹象表明其可用范围会扩展到其他地区。

![Apple Card iPhone 16 Pro Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-pxe32TVB9YD8M5N2oVCEoHtLrc=/400x0/article-new/2025/01/Apple-Card-iPhone-16-Pro-Feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: Apple Card 迎来六周年，正面临重大变革。摩根大通正与苹果洽谈，有望取代高盛成为其金融合作伙伴。高盛因消费贷款业务亏损而退出。若合作方更换，Apple Card 的功能、政策、利率和客户服务可能随之调整。目前，Apple Card 仅在美国可用，且摩根大通不提供类似高收益储蓄账户。
items.translated_title: Apple Card 迎来六周年，重大变革在即
items.content:
Tomorrow marks the sixth anniversary of the Apple Card becoming widely available in the U.S., following a more limited preview period.


Apple's credit card can be managed in the iPhone's Wallet app, with key benefits including color-coded spending summaries, no fees, and Daily Cash cash back paid out daily. Apple Card holders can also open a high-yield savings account.

The anniversary comes ahead of a big change planned for the Apple Card.

Specifically, The Wall Street Journal last month reported that Chase Bank parent company JPMorgan was in "advanced talks" with Apple about replacing Goldman Sachs as the Apple Card's financial partner. Goldman Sachs is in the process of winding down its consumer lending business, which has lost billions of dollars in recent years, and Apple is reportedly willing to let them out of their contract that is supposed to run until 2030.

If the Apple Card does eventually get a new financial partner, there could be updates to the card's features, policies, interest rates, and customer service processes, although exact changes if any remain to be seen. It is also worth noting that Chase Bank does not currently offer a high-yield savings account akin to Apple Card Savings.

Unfortunately, the Apple Card remains available in the U.S. only, and there is no indication that will change in the near future.

What do you think of the Apple Card after six years? Let us know in the comments section.
Tag: Apple Card

items.title: 国家公园 Apple Watch 健身挑战将于8月24日启动 (原标题: National Parks Apple Watch Activity Challenge Launching August 24)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 国家公园 Apple Watch 健身挑战

Apple 将于 **2025年8月24日（星期日）** 举办其年度国家公园 Apple Watch 健身挑战活动。

## 活动目的
此活动旨在庆祝美国各地的国家公园。

## 参与方式与奖励
*   **参与条件**：Apple Watch 用户需在 **2025年8月24日** 当天完成一项持续 **20分钟或更长时间** 的体能训练。
*   **获得奖励**：成功完成挑战的用户将获得一个 Apple Watch 健身奖章。
*   **额外奖励**：与所有 Apple Watch 健身挑战一样，获得奖章的用户还将获得可在信息应用中使用的动画贴纸。

## 相关内容
除了新的 Apple Watch 挑战外，Apple 通常在八月还会提供其他国家公园主题的内容，包括：
*   Apple Pay 捐赠计划
*   Apple TV+ 相关内容
*   Apple Music 歌曲
*   书籍
*   播客
*   以及更多其他内容。

items.translated_title: 国家公园 Apple Watch 健身挑战将于8月24日启动
items.content:
Apple will host its annual National Parks Apple Watch activity challenge on Sunday, August 24. The event is designed to celebrate national parks across the United States.


Apple Watch owners can earn an Apple Watch activity award by doing a workout that lasts for 20 minutes or more on August 24, 2025.

Like all of the Apple Watch activity challenges, earning the award will provide users with animated stickers that can be used in the Messages app.








Along with a new Apple Watch challenge, Apple typically offers other national parks-themed content in August, including an Apple Pay donation program, Apple TV+ content, Apple Music songs, books, podcasts, and more.

items.title: 苹果发布AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4新测试版固件 (原标题: Apple Releases New Beta Firmware for AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods 4)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果发布AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4新测试版固件

## 主要更新
*   **发布日期与对象**：2025年8月19日，苹果向开发者发布了适用于AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4的最新测试版固件。
*   **目的**：旨在让开发者测试iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS Tahoe中新增的AirPods功能。
*   **可用性与要求**：该固件目前仅供开发者使用，且设备需运行iOS 26、iPadOS 26或macOS 26才能安装更新。
*   **固件版本**：新固件的内部版本号为8A5343a，高于此前的8A5324b。

## 新增功能
新固件为AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4带来了多项与iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS Tahoe同步推出的功能：
*   **通话音频质量提升**：显著改善了电话和视频通话的音频质量。
*   **录音功能增强**：支持录制工作室品质的音频，适用于访谈、播客和视频内容。
*   **相机遥控功能**：AirPods可作为相机应用的遥控器，用于拍照或开始视频录制。
*   **便捷安装**：在iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS Tahoe中，当AirPods连接到iPhone、iPad或Mac时，用户可直接从AirPods设置界面选择安装测试版固件，极大方便了测试过程。

![AirPods Pro 2 绿色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/tFDpxw1cMeHGlw_2tHeHI9iYXjA=/400x0/article-new/2024/04/airpods-pro-2-green.jpg?lossy)

## 其他热门新闻
文章还提及了近期其他一些与苹果相关的热门新闻：
*   **苹果开发全新操作系统**：据彭博社报道，苹果正在开发代号为“Charismatic”的全新操作系统，很可能是传闻中的“homeOS”，预计将用于2026年的智能家居中枢和2027年的桌面机器人。
*   **未发布设备信息泄露**：马克·古尔曼回应了上周苹果意外泄露的软件工具中包含的未发布设备和芯片标识符，涉及Studio Display、Apple TV、Apple Watch、Apple Vision Pro、iPad mini、HomePod mini等。
*   **iOS 26 Beta 7更新**：iOS 26的第七个开发者测试版已发布，其中包括Apple Watch Series 9上重新设计的血氧功能。
*   **iPhone 17 Pro Max内部设计泄露**：据称iPhone 17 Pro Max的内部设计图（带有金属电池）已在韩国平台Naver上流出。
*   **iPhone 18发布延迟**：有报道称，苹果可能会将基础款iPhone 18的发布推迟到2027年春季，2026年9月可能只发布高端型号。
*   **Apple Watch重大重新设计**：据DigiTimes报道，至少一款2026年发布的Apple Watch型号将进行“重大重新设计”，包括外观变化和八个环形排列的传感器。
*   **2025年苹果设计奖获奖者公布**：苹果在WWDC 2025前公布了年度设计奖获奖名单，表彰了在创新、独创性和技术成就方面的优秀应用和游戏，如“Delight and Fun”类别的CapWords和Balatro，以及“Innovation”类别的Play和PBJ。
items.shortSummary: 苹果已向开发者发布了AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4的新测试版固件，旨在配合iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS Tahoe测试新功能。此次更新提升了通话和录音质量，并新增了将AirPods用作相机遥控器的功能。开发者现在可以直接通过设备设置安装此固件，以便测试这些改进。
items.translated_title: 苹果发布AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4新测试版固件
items.content:
Apple today provided developers with updated beta firmware for the AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods 4, allowing them to test the new AirPods features in iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS Tahoe. The firmware is only available to developers at the current time, and a device running ‌iOS 26‌, ‌iPadOS 26‌, or macOS 26 is required to install the update. The firmware has a build number of 8A5343a, up from 8A5324b.


The firmware adds several features that Apple is debuting alongside ‌iOS 26‌, ‌iPadOS 26‌, and macOS Tahoe.

The ‌AirPods Pro‌ 2 and ‌AirPods 4‌ support improved audio quality for phone calls and video calls, plus studio-quality audio recording for interviews, podcasts, and videos. There's also an option to use the AirPods as a camera remote with the Camera app to take photos or start a video recording.

With ‌iOS 26‌, ‌iPadOS 26‌, and macOS Tahoe, Apple added a beta firmware update installation option that's available from the AirPods settings interface when the AirPods are connected to an iPhone, iPad, or Mac, which facilitates the beta testing.

items.title: iPhone 驾驶执照支持扩展至蒙大拿州 (原标题: iPhone Driver's License Support Expands to Montana)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### 蒙大拿州支持iPhone数字驾照/ID

自2025年8月19日起，蒙大拿州的iPhone和Apple Watch用户现可将驾驶执照和身份证件添加到Apple钱包应用中，从而可以使用设备上的数字ID，替代实体ID进行身份验证。

### 蒙大拿州移动ID (Montana Mobile IDs)

*   **推出与用途**：蒙大拿州机动车管理局（MVD）已推出“蒙大拿州移动ID”。这些移动ID可用于在线、应用内和面对面的身份验证。
*   **商家便利**：参与商家可使用蒙大拿州移动ID验证用户的年龄，尤其适用于受年龄限制的购买，无需额外提供姓名、地址和出生日期等信息。
*   **官方声明**：MVD管理员Laurie Bakri表示，MVD在过去三年中致力于现代化和提高运营效率及客户服务，现在正迈入创新时代，从蒙大拿州移动ID及其验证器应用开始。

### 如何添加和使用

*   **添加方式**：蒙大拿州居民可通过打开Apple钱包应用，点击“+”按钮，然后按照屏幕指示添加驾照或州ID。
*   **接受范围**：
    *   移动ID可在选择参与的商家和组织中使用。
    *   MVD考试站的自助值机亭接受移动ID。
    *   美国运输安全管理局（TSA）已确认，全美超过250个TSA机场接受移动ID。
    *   预计到今年年底，蒙大拿州公路巡警也将具备验证移动ID的能力。
*   **商家工具**：蒙大拿州已为商家推出了“蒙大拿州移动ID验证器”应用，方便商家接受数字ID。

### 重要提示

*   iPhone和Apple Watch上的数字ID并非在所有地方都通用。
*   蒙大拿州官员建议用户仍需随身携带实体驾照。

### 全国范围的采纳情况

*   Apple于2022年宣布钱包应用支持数字ID，但各州采纳速度较慢。
*   **已支持的州/地区**：亚利桑那州、科罗拉多州、佐治亚州、马里兰州、新墨西哥州、爱荷华州、加利福尼亚州、夏威夷州、俄亥俄州以及波多黎各。
*   **正在开发支持的州**：密西西比州、伊利诺伊州、康涅狄格州、肯塔基州、俄克拉荷马州、犹他州和西弗吉尼亚州。

### 图片

![蒙大拿州数字ID钱包应用](https://images.macrumors.com/t/auu_jPXd-YY9BR7gxLmoIJLSsoE=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/montana-digital-id-wallet-app.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 蒙大拿州现已支持iPhone用户将驾驶执照和ID添加到Apple钱包，实现数字身份验证。这些“蒙大拿州移动ID”可用于线上、应用内及面对面验证，并被参与商家、MVD考试站和全美250多个TSA机场接受。尽管如此，用户仍需携带实体驾照。蒙大拿州是最新采纳此功能的州，Apple于2022年宣布了该支持。
items.translated_title: iPhone 驾驶执照支持扩展至蒙大拿州
items.content:
iPhone users located in Montana can now add their driver's licenses and IDs to the Apple Wallet app on the ‌iPhone‌ and Apple Watch, allowing an on-device digital ID to be used instead of a physical ID.


The Montana Motor Vehicle Division launched Montana Mobile IDs today. The mobile IDs are able to be used for identity verification online, in-app, and in-person. Participating businesses can use Montana mobile IDs to verify the age of a user for an age-restricted purchase without the need for additional information like name, address, and birth date.
"We have spent the last three years modernizing MVD and improving operating efficiencies and customer service," MVD Administrator Laurie Bakri said. "Now that we have overhauled the basics, we are excited to embark on an era of innovation, starting with Montana Mobile IDs and the Montana Mobile ID Verifier for Android and iOS mobile devices."

Montana residents can add a license or state ID to the Apple Wallet app by opening it, tapping on the "+" button, and following the onscreen instructions.

According to the Montana Motor Vehicle Division, mobile IDs can be used at businesses and organizations that have opted to participate. The IDs are accepted at MVD exam stations with a check-in kiosk, and the TSA has confirmed that mobile IDs can be used at more than 250 TSA airports across the United States. By the end of this year, the Montana Highway Patrol should have the ability to verify mobile IDs.

Montana has launched a Montana Mobile ID Verifier app for businesses, making it simple for businesses to accept mobile IDs in the state.

Digital IDs on the ‌iPhone‌ and Apple Watch are not accepted everywhere, and Montana officials say that users should always carry a physical license as well.

Apple announced a new Wallet app that supported digital IDs back in 2022, but states have been slow to adopt the feature. Arizona, Colorado, Georgia, Maryland, New Mexico, Iowa, California, Hawaii, and Ohio have implemented support, as has Puerto Rico. Apple has said that Mississippi, Illinois, Connecticut, Kentucky, Oklahoma, Utah, and West Virginia are working on support.
This article, "iPhone Driver's License Support Expands to Montana" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: watchOS 26 公测版发布，血氧功能重新设计 (原标题: watchOS 26 Public Beta Launches With Redesigned Blood Oxygen Feature)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## watchOS 26 公测版发布：血氧功能重获新生及更多更新

苹果于2025年8月19日发布了 watchOS 26 的第四个公测版，该版本在向开发者发布一天后推出。此次更新的重点是为美国地区的 Apple Watch Series 9、Apple Watch Series 10 和 Apple Watch Ultra 2 型号带来了重新设计的血氧功能。

### 血氧功能回归

*   **背景与原因**：自2024年1月起，由于法律问题，苹果最新款美国 Apple Watch 型号的血氧传感功能被禁用。苹果通过调整其工作方式，成功使该功能回归。
*   **受影响设备**：主要针对美国地区的 Apple Watch Series 9、Series 10 和 Ultra 2 型号。
*   **新机制**：
    *   此前不支持血氧传感的 Apple Watch 现在可以再次进行测量。
    *   所有计算和结果都必须在 iPhone 上的“健康”应用中查看，具体路径为“呼吸”部分。
*   **不受影响的设备**：2024年1月之前销售的以及在美国以外地区销售的 Apple Watch 型号，其血氧传感功能和原始血氧应用一直正常可用。
*   **此前引入**：苹果此前已为 iOS 18 和 watchOS 11 用户重新引入了血氧传感功能，并于昨日向 watchOS 26 开发者开放。

![Apple Watch Series 6 Blood Oxygen LEDs](https://images.macrumors.com/t/MMk4BNSn7U7UrCs1h4iqnGxCPJQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Apple-Watch-Series-6-Blood-Oxygen-LEDs.jpg?lossy)

### watchOS 26 其他新功能

除了血氧功能的回归，watchOS 26 更新还带来了多项新特性：

*   **Workout Buddy**：一项 Apple Intelligence 功能，旨在激励用户在锻炼期间保持动力。
*   **体能训练应用界面**：界面经过重新设计，提供更优化的用户体验。
*   **智能叠放 (Smart Stack)**：提供更多可操作的建议，提升便捷性。
*   **信息 (Messages) 应用**：新增实时翻译功能和更智能的智能回复。
*   **电话 (Phone) 应用**：在 Apple Watch 上支持来电筛选 (Call Screening) 和通话辅助 (Hold Assist) 等功能。
*   **备忘录 (Notes) 应用**：用户现在可以直接在手腕上创建和查看备忘录。

### 发布时间

watchOS 26 预计将于今年秋季正式向公众发布。
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布 watchOS 26 第四个公测版，主要亮点是为美国地区 Apple Watch Series 9、Series 10 和 Ultra 2 重新设计并恢复了血氧功能。由于法律问题，该功能此前被禁用，现在测量结果需在 iPhone 的健康应用中查看。此外，watchOS 26 还带来了 Workout Buddy、重新设计的体能训练应用界面、增强的智能叠放、信息应用的实时翻译和智能回复、电话应用的来电筛选和通话辅助，以及备忘录应用。watchOS 26 预计将于秋季正式发布。
items.translated_title: watchOS 26 公测版发布，血氧功能重新设计

images.alt: Apple Watch Series 6 Blood Oxygen LEDs

items.content:
Apple today released the fourth public beta of watchOS 26, a day after the beta was made available to developers. This particular beta adds support for the redesigned Blood Oxygen feature on the Apple Watch Series 9, Apple Watch Series 10, and Apple Watch Ultra 2 models in the United States.


‌watchOS 26‌ public beta 4 can downloaded through the Apple Watch app on the iPhone after you sign up on Apple's beta website.

Blood oxygen sensing has been disabled on Apple's latest U.S. Apple Watch models since January 2024 due to a legal issue, but Apple was able to bring the feature back by tweaking how it works. Apple Watches that previously did not support blood oxygen sensing can once again take readings, but all calculations and results are viewable on the ‌iPhone‌.

Apple previously reintroduced blood oxygen sensing for iOS 18 and watchOS 11 users, and it was made available for developers with ‌watchOS 26‌ yesterday.

Apple Watch models sold before January 2024 and outside of the U.S. have always had a functional blood oxygen sensing feature and the original blood oxygen app. Apple Watch Series 9, Series 10, and Ultra 2 users will now need to open the Health app and go to the Respiratory section to view their blood oxygen results.

The ‌watchOS 26‌ update brings additional features, such Workout Buddy, an Apple Intelligence feature meant to motivate you during your workouts. The Workout app interface has been redesigned, the Smart Stack has more actionable suggestions, the Messages app offer Live Translation and better Smart Replies, and the Phone app features like Call Screening and Hold Assist are available on the watch. Apple also brought the Notes app to the Apple Watch, so you can create notes and view existing notes right from your wrist.

‌watchOS 26‌ will launch to the public in the fall.

items.title: iOS 18.6.2 更新即将登陆 iPhone (原标题: iOS 18.6.2 Update Coming Soon for iPhones)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# iOS 18.6.2 更新即将发布

根据MacRumors的访客日志（一个可靠的iOS版本指示器），苹果的软件工程师正在测试iOS 18.6.2。

## 关键信息来源
*   **MacRumors 访客日志：** 显示苹果正在测试iOS 18.6.2，证实了该更新的存在。
*   **匿名消息来源：** 一位曾有准确记录的匿名消息人士此前也表示iOS 18.6.2即将到来。
    *   **历史记录：** 去年，同一消息人士曾称iOS 17.5.2正在开发中，但苹果最终发布了iOS 17.5.1的修订版本。
    *   **当前推测：** 消息人士曾推测iOS 18.6.2也可能是iOS 18.6.1的修订版本，但MacRumors的日志表明苹果确实计划发布独立的iOS 18.6.2。

## 更新内容预测
iOS 18.6.2预计将包含：
*   错误修复
*   安全补丁
*   可能对重新设计的“血氧”功能进行额外增强。
    *   **背景：** 该功能于上周随iOS 18.6.1和watchOS 11.6.1在部分美国Apple Watch型号上推出。

## 版本号
*   iOS 18.6.2的内部版本号将是 **22G100**。
*   作为对比，iOS 18.6.1的内部版本号是22G90。

## 发布时间
鉴于该更新的证据已在多个地方出现，iOS 18.6.2预计将很快发布，很可能就在本周或下周。

items.translated_title: iOS 18.6.2 更新即将登陆 iPhone
items.content:
Apple's software engineers are testing iOS 18.6.2, according to the MacRumors visitor logs, which have been a reliable indicator of upcoming iOS versions.


Yesterday, an anonymous source with a proven track record said iOS 18.6.2 was incoming, but the update was not present in our logs at that time.

Last year, the same anonymous source claimed that iOS 17.5.2 was in the pipeline, but Apple ended up releasing a revised iOS 17.5.1 build for the iPad 10. Accordingly, the source said it was possible that iOS 18.6.2 might end up being a revised build of iOS 18.6.1, but our logs suggest that Apple is indeed planning to release iOS 18.6.2.

iOS 18.6.2 will likely include bug fixes and/or security patches, and perhaps some additional enhancements to the redesigned Blood Oxygen feature introduced on select Apple Watch models in the U.S. with iOS 18.6.1 and watchOS 11.6.1 last week. The update will have a build number of 22G100, according to the anonymous source.

iOS 18.6.1's build number is 22G90.

iOS 18.6.2 should be released soon — likely this week or next week — given that evidence of the update is now showing up in multiple places.
